fullplot: As Grace heads off to college and experiences a lifestyle far different than the one she had brought up under her grandmother's strict hand, she begins a traumatic downward spiral that threatens her sanity. The more she explores the true nature of her nightmares and black outs, the more it becomes clear that an outside, supernatural force is responsible.
plot: Grace is an 18-year-old Catholic girl whose purity is overtaken by a demonic force. Will it consume her?
title: Grace
